Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Synermed Glucose Reagent and Synermed IR-1200 Chemistry Analyzer for quantitative serum glucose measurement using spectrophotometry.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative measurement of glucose in serum on the Synermed IR-1200 Analyzer, aiding in diagnosis and treatment of carbohydrate metabolism disorders including diabetes mellitus, neonatal hypoglycemia, and pancreatic islet cell carcinoma; analyzer intended for clinical laboratory use only.
